entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Penticton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 p.m. PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 12.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 8:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 8.9°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
